original_text: When the cloud lifted from above the tent, Miriam’s skin was leprous—it became as white as snow. Aaron turned toward her and saw that she had a defiling skin disease,
korean_text: 구름이 장막 위에서 떠나갔고 미리암은 나병에 걸려 눈과 같더라 아론이 미리암을 본즉 나병에 걸렸는지라

sentences.original_text: When the cloud lifted from above the tent
it became as white as snow
and saw that she had a defiling skin disease
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 부정한 피부병을 가지고 있음을 보았다
